scripts.dockerize_load_balancer: cd Load_Balancer && docker build --rm -f Dockerfile -t alecmaly/loadbalancer && docker push alecmaly/loadbalancer
scripts.install_all: npm run install_client && npm run install_server
scripts.build_all: npm run build_client && npm run build_server
scripts.dockerize_all: npm run dockerize_client && npm run dockerize_server && npm run dockerize_load_balancer
